module.name: PIN Sets
module.description: Allow creation of lists of PINs (numbers for passwords) that can be used by other modules (eg, trunks).
module.changelog: *2.11.0.9* FREEPBX-8478 Add a label to pinset macro *2.11.0.8* FREEPBX-7745 Wording consistency: add password Set *2.11.0.7* FREEPBX-7908 readjust priorities *2.11.0.6* #7885 *2.11.0.5* #1953 *2.11.0.4* Include license file *2.11.0.3* Update to use ::create() call. *2.11.0.2* Fix pinsets_get_config hook error *2.11.0.1* #6653 *2.11.0.0* method priority for pinset pro *2.10.0.2* #5597 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
